case 1.case description: Add NPS question with default setting.
case 1.case validation: Validate question is added or not.

case 2.case description: Add NPS question. Enter the question text. Make question mandatory.
case 2.case validation: Validate question is added or not. Validate Mandatory icon is given or not (Checks svg element on DOM).
case 2.question text: Add NPS question. Enter the question text. Make question mandatory.

case 3.case description: Add NPS question. Enter the question text. Make question encourage.
case 3.case validation: Validate question is added or not. Check for encourage message fields is displayed or not.

case 4.case description: Add NPS question. Enter the question text. Add Question Hint.
case 4.case validation: Validate question is added or not. Validate Question Hint Text shown inside the hover tooltip.
case 4.questionHintText: Prepare their minds ahead of time by adding an estimated survey-completion time. While shorter surveys are likely to have more respondents, don't give a false estimation to bait people to fill your survey.
case 4.question text: Add NPS question. Enter the question text. Add Question Hint.

case 5.case description: Add NPS question. Enter the question text. Add Question Hint. Change the answer labels.
